desc: Mario game using HTML5 Canvas. Still under development. But first 2 levels available! Play HERE

Weather extension for Chrome. Written on TypeScript and React.
Features:
Languages support: Ru/En
Animated chart
Geolocation
50 hours of detailed weather information: temperature, humidity, precipitation, wind
shortDesc: Weather extension for Chrome with TypeScript + React

desc:
masonrylayout-tsx-react exports MasonryLayout component from index.tsx. It allows to create grid layout based on columns with auto-placement and optimized usage of Y-space by reducing unnecessary gaps
Live Demo: HERE
shortDesc: React-component to create grid layout based on columns with auto-placement and optimized usage of Y-space

desc: Plugin for WEBPACK. Main feature is to make external-script as inline-script. Used by at least 16 PEOPLE according to dependency graph
shortDesc: Plugin for Webpack for making inline-scripts

desc:
Summary site prg938.vercel.app build with Next.js React Framework. Deployed to Vercel.

Features:
SEO-optimized SSG - Static Site Generation with prefetched and cached data
CSR - Client Side Rendering with SWR for client-side fetching & caching
next/image for image optimization
next/font/google for fonts optimization
next/link for client-side routing
Flexible layout system
Auto-routing using file-structure
shortDesc: Summary site with Next React Framework

desc: A tiny tool written on Node.js for reading wav-file. Analyses specific bytes and returns object with data
Node.js tool to bootstrap new Chrome extension using React
shortDesc: Node-tool to bootstrap new Chrome extension using React
